thread.title: Samsung offering a discount on the Galaxy S7 and S7 Edge
thread.title_full: Samsung offering a discount on the Galaxy S7 and S7 Edge

author: Erna Mahyuni
title: Samsung offering a discount on the Galaxy S7 and S7 Edge
text:
Samsung offering a discount on the Galaxy S7 and S7 Edge Samsung likely clearing older stocks, with the Galaxy S8 coming soon 23 March 2017 / 12:26MYT 
While Samsung's set to launch the Galaxy S8 end of the month, Samsung Malaysia is having a promo on the Galaxy S7 and S7 Edge. A matter of stocks 
While the Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge was launched earlier, it is far easier to find than the smaller and cheaper Samsung Galaxy S7. 
The original RRP of the S7 Edge is RM3099 while the S7 is RM2699. The price after the discount would mean that you could get an S7 Edge for RM2599 and RM2199 for the S7. Considering these were last year's flagships, it's not a bad deal at all. 
You'll need to find the nearest official Samsung store to avail yourself of the deal though. 
If you're more keen on the Galaxy S8 instead, here's what we know so far about Samsung's most exciting phone for the moment.
